meanings.sent1: The simple worm is nonmetameric, with a smooth body.
meanings.sent2: The snake's body is nonmetameric, showing no visible segments.
meanings.sent3: The nonmetameric caterpillar wore a tiny top hat for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her nonmetameric thoughts flowed seamlessly, like a gentle stream.
meanings.sent5: The nonmetameric design of the building made it look like a single, elegant structure.

meanings.sent1: The nonmetameric insect had a continuous body without sections.
meanings.sent2: The jellyfish is nonmetameric, lacking distinct parts.
meanings.sent3: The nonmetameric puzzle had no separate pieces to put together.
meanings.sent4: Her nonmetameric approach to problem-solving was holistic and complete.
meanings.sent5: The nonmetameric flower appeared as a single, undivided bloom.

meanings.sent1: The nonmetameric fish had a smooth, unsegmented body.
meanings.sent2: The slug is nonmetameric, without any visible divisions.
meanings.sent3: The nonmetameric cloud looked like a fluffy, shapeless blob.
meanings.sent4: Her nonmetameric dance moves were fluid and continuous.
meanings.sent5: The nonmetameric melody flowed seamlessly, without distinct notes.
